channel.title: Help with Frames please?
channel.description:
Ok - For all those who read this, you will be telling yourself how stupid i am. Just letting you know that idc, so you dont need to reply just to let me know that. ---
I am currently working on a server from the 1337pkz source...
What i would like to know is how i could make a players kill count / death count display on their screen... I already know i have to do something to do with frames.... but what i need to know is how to "make" them, if you can, and basically just about them.... I have already looked through these forums but havent found anything that really explains what they are etc...
Thanks, Unborn / Ben
